input.sentences: there were plenty of fresh baked goods at the store .
i decided to venture out to find a batch of fresh flowers too .
i also wanted to visit a new store for bagels .
my son came along with although he napped for most of the way .
we relaxed at the pier until night time .
output.sentences: We spent the day in town shopping and found a store that had plenty of fresh bread to choose from.
Our next venture was to a store that had beautiful fresh flowers.
The last store we paid a visit to was famous for its bagels.
My husband and I enjoyed shopping today but my son was indifferent as he napped the entire time.
With our shopping trip over it was time to take our son's lead, so we went to the pier and relaxed.
